Package model

Class Puzzle

java.lang.Object
model.Puzzle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Puzzle extends Object implements Serializable
Puzzle class represents the word of the day. It also indicates the correctness of a guess attempt by coding each letter with respective colors.
Since:
April 8, 2023
